name: Memory Games
description:
Memory Games contains 3 challenging games to test your memory. Suitable for all ages from children right up to adults, it is a good test of your memory, and a great way to increase your memory with practise.

The classic game of memory:
- Turn over 1 card at a time looking for pairs, but remember where cards you previously turned over are; this will help you in future.
- Contains three different difficulty settings.

Recall:
- You have 3 seconds to study an image and remember what items are on the page, then you have to select them from all the items displayed.
- Difficulty increases with every round you get right.

Match:
- You are shown 2 - 9 cards face up, which then flip over. You then need to flip them all back over, without turning over the wrong card.
- Contains three different difficulty settings.
